long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Etisalcom CRM Extension, Through this extension we are providing our local user connectivity with our CRM and it is only for local users not for the public one, 

we are providing Click to Call, Call Pop Up, Call Log in CRM, Call Report, Call relation with records in CRM, Call Pop up with All information, Call Recording in CRM, Call Notes, Other function like Call Transfer, Hang up, Create Meeting, Contact, Lead, Account, case, task and Schedule Call over CRM for local users.
